age.long_description: Age group, based on age in current years.

n_obesity_county.long_description: Total number of patients within the county-level obesity sample.

obesity_bmi.short_description: Percent of sample with a BMI between 30 and 49.8 in the past 2 years.

obesity_dx_cdw.long_name: Obesity based on the CCW definition
obesity_dx_cdw.long_description: Percent of sample with a diagnostic code for obesity on an encounter in the past 2 years, similar to the CCW definition: https://www2.ccwdata.org/web/guest/condition-categories-other.

diabetes_a1c_6_5.long_name: Prevalence of diabetes based on elevated Hemoglobin A1c in the previous 2 years
diabetes_a1c_6_5.long_description: Percent of sample with a measurement of Hemoglobin A1c greater than 6.5% in the past 2 years.

diabetes_dx_ccw.long_name: Diabetes based on the CCW definition
diabetes_dx_ccw.long_description: Percent of sample with a diagnostic code for diabetes on an encounter in the past 2 years, similar to the CCW definition: https://www2.ccwdata.org/web/guest/condition-categories-chronic.

hemoglobin_a1c_7.short_description: Percent of sample with Hemoglobin A1C test results of 7% or more.

bmi_30_49_8.short_description: Percent of sample with a BMI between 30 and 49.8.

percentage_with_base_patient_followed_by.short_description: Percent of sample with Hemoglobin A1C test results of 6.5% or more.
